successes.title: Krosmaster Arena Anime Miniatures Board Game
successes.description: Krosmaster Arena is a miniatures board game that is designed around using cute anime warriors to take on your opponents!

Pledges.description: SUPPORTER LEVEL - Our thanks, and an online code for the Yugo Promo for use in the online version of Krosmaster: Arena!
HELPER LEVEL - You'll receive the Yugo Promo as well as the online code to use the figure in the online version of Krosmaster: Arena!
STARTER LEVEL - A copy of the game Krosmaster: Arena, a poster, and the Yugo Promo! Ships free in the USA!
COMMANDER LEVEL - A copy of the game, the poster, a special set of alternative trees and bushes, the Yugo Promo AND the Amelia Promo! Ships free in the USA! - also eligible for all stretch goals.

MASTER LEVEL - A copy of the game, the poster, the first 3 expansions to the game, the special set of alternative trees and bushes, the Yugo Promo AND the Amelia Promo! Ships free in the USA!
- also eligible for all stretch goals.

COLLECTOR'S EDITION - A copy of the game, the poster, the first 3 expansions to the game, the special set of alternative trees and bushes, Yugo Promo, Amelia Promo, and a set of Resin tokens including trees and bushes! Ships free in the USA!
- also eligible for all stretch goals.

CHAMPION COLLECTOR'S EDITION - A copy of the game, the first 3 expansions, the poster, the special set of alternative trees and bushes, the Resin Token pack, Yugo Promo, Amelia Promo, Goultard Promo, Nox Promo, a special resin token pack, and metal Gallons of Glory tokens! Ships free in the USA! - also eligible for all stretch goals.

I WANT ALL THE THINGS NOW! EDITION - A copy of the game, the poster, the special set of alternative trees and bushes, the Resin Token pack, Yugo Promo, Amelia Promo, Goultard Promo, Nox Promo, a special resin token pack, metal Gallons of Glory tokens, and all the figures being released this year in expansion packs! Ships free in the USA!
- also eligible for all stretch goals.

I WANT ALL THE THINGS NOW! Goultard XXL EDITION - A copy of the game, the poster, the special set of alternative trees and bushes, the Resin Token pack, Yugo Promo, Amelia Promo, Goultard Promo, Nox Promo, a special resin token pack, metal Gallons of Glory tokens, and all the figures being released this year in expansion packs! This also includes a limited edition Goultard the Barbarian XXL figure that is limited to only 200 copies made worldwide! Only 50 are available through Kickstarter. Ships free in the USA! - also eligible for all stretch goals.

I WANT ALL THE THINGS NOW! Nox XXL EDITION - A copy of the game, the poster, the special set of alternative trees and bushes, the Resin Token pack, Yugo Promo, Amelia Promo, Goultard Promo, Nox Promo, a special resin token pack, metal Gallons of Glory tokens, and all the figures being released this year in expansion packs! This also includes a limited edition Nox XXL figure that is limited to only 200 copies made worldwide! This was a special add on that we were able to offer to you, and the whole run of this figure is available only through Kickstarter! Ships free in the USA! - also eligible for all stretch goals.
